container_content_introduction: Hello! I'm just a shark lover living in Japan.
I create various things in my free time, mainly games.
I've played VRChat so much I reached KnownUser. Let's be friends!
ChronosFall_content:
The near future where most of the world was destroyed by the sudden
"Spacetime Collapse". However, some areas miraculously escaped the destruction and continue to exist as "Time Faults". Surviving humanity quietly carries on its life there.

As the protagonist working for **"STPS"**, an organization established within the Time Faults, you chase the mystery of the Spacetime Collapse, aiming to reunite with your lost sibling from several years ago.
